summary: This code defines a function "mover" that takes two arguments: "plist", which is a list of file paths, and "dest", the destination folder. It creates a temporary file called "shallowCopy.sh" in write mode. Then it iterates through each term in the plist and writes a command to copy each file to the specified destination using the "cp" command. The "&\n" at the end of each line ensures that commands are written on separate lines in the temporary file.
